name: Loft in Antwerpen · ★4.83 · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 3 baths
host_about:
After working for over 15 years as a consultant, trainer and coach in human resources for private people and organisations in different sectors, I have decided in 2018 to reorient my career and to follow my passion for interior design and real estate. 
I’m here to go above and beyond to ensure all our guests enjoy their stay and to provide the best quality customer service possible. I like to spend my free time with my family and enjoying what our beautiful city has to offer. We look forward to hosting you and providing you the best Airbnb experience.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Seefhoek neighborhood of Antwerp. It is one of the most multicultural parts of the city, with a lively admixture of Asian, Turkish and North African food stores and cafes. Vincent van Gogh lived in this neighborhood for a few months back in 1885-86; reflected in some of his paintings (e.g. ‘Houses seen from the back’) :-)

neighborhood_overview:
Zurenborg is a trendy, cozy neighborhood where the architecture is breathtaking. At the Draakplaats and the Dageraadplaats there are a lot of nice cafes and restaurants where you can enjoy a drink until the early hours.
The city itself is not far away either. You can reach the center in 10 minutes by bike or a 20 minute walk. Public transport can also takes you to every part of Antwerp. Do you prefer to visit a different city? The station is a 5-minute walk from this attic apartment.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Harmonie neighborhood is a charming and historic district in Antwerp, Belgium. It is located in the city's south, and is known for its beautiful Art Nouveau architecture, its tree-lined streets, and its lively atmosphere with a whole bunch of cafes and restaurants!

The neighborhood is named after the Harmonie, a former music hall that was built in the 19th century. The hall was demolished in the 1970s, but the name has lived on. A lot of street names (including mine) have a musical touch :)

neighborhood_overview:
Het is gelegen in de bruisende wijk “seefhoek” met veel bakkers, groente- en fruitwinkels om de hoek. Het ligt op een boogscheut van Borgerhout, een opkomende buurt met veel leuke cafeetjes en restaurants.
Ook op wandelafstand vind je een tram- en bushalte en er zijn stadsfietsen voor de deur. Het treinstation “Antwerpen Centraal” is op 25 minuten wandelen. Het is de perfecte locatie om de stad Antwerpen te ontdekken.
Het appartement is op de derde verdieping. Daarom vragen we stil te zijn na 22u ‘s avonds.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.22 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of the city centre and in the middle of the Fashion district, Sint Andries. The historical City Centre, the shopping streets, the trendy “Eilandje” with a.o. several of the landmark museums of Antwerp, the marina and lots of nice bars and restaurants are all only a short walk away. A great staging area for a visit of Antwerp! The new Cadix hospital as well as a large number of university buildings are also located nearby.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.70 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath

neighborhood_overview:
Het Eilandje did not steal its name: Antwerp's oldest port area is surrounded by water. Today, port activity is concentrated more to the north, but the port feeling still prevails here. Taste the old atmosphere of the unloading quay with monumental warehouses, lanterns, hangars and cobblestones. Thanks to three crowd-pullers, the MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, the Red Star Line Museum and the Port House, the connection between the city and the water is once again underlined.

At the foot of the London Tower, the Island is connected by the famous Park Bridge to "Park Spoor Noord" , a very spacious, open and green park that emphasizes greenery, light, space, relaxation, culture, sports and events.
The park is built on a 24-hectare old railroad yard that had been abandoned for years. It has several playgrounds, a spectacular bmx and skatebowl, two delightful water playgrounds and a shelter with bar Cargo's temporary summer terrace. The park is a hit with Antwerp residents who

host_about: Life is short , world is big !We love travelling as we  like new adventures in life . We enjoy  seeing the difference in culture , in food, in life style , in people.We do not like being stucked in a hotel room which dose not give you much more  than just a bed to sleep. No matter you are alone or you are with friends , you will always find your  hideout here .

name: Shipping container in Antwerpen · ★4.73 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
Serviced apartment in Antwerpen · ★4.57 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
This area of Antwerp is hot and happening!!! It belongs to the old and rich neighborhood 't Zuid, which now is known as a vibrant neighborhood with a lot of great great restaurants, high fashion and haute couture, amazing facades and architecture and the biggest and richest museum of Flanders: the KMSKA. Located in a quiet side street of this neighborhood, you will walk from this apartment within 5 minutes to the KMSKA, within 5 minutes to the Marnixplaats, within 10 minutes to the Nationalestraat and within 15 minutes to the Grote Markt and historic center of Antwerp.
You can also easily take trams and busses at the end of the street to Antwerp Central Station and to all other highlights and hotspots in the city.
host_about:
Hi Hello! Ik ben Liselore, 32 jaar en uw host tijdens uw verblijf in Antwerpen! Met liefde voor interieur, architectuur en hospitality begon ik 4 jaar geleden mijn kleurrijke en gezellige bedrijf SHWAY in Antwerpen. Bij SHWAY voelt het alsof u logeert bij uw beste vriend, maar met de service van een hotel!
Met unieke verblijven op toplocaties in het centrum van Antwerpen, uitgebreide tips en weetjes over de stad en evenementen, soepele automatische check-ins, 24/7 bereikbaarheid en een zeer hoge standaard van de schoonmaak, zorg ik voor een gestroomlijnde en onvergetelijke city/business trip in mijn geweldige stad!

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
De Reijndersstraat ligt midden in het historisch centrum van Antwerpen. De Groenplaats bevindt zich om de hoek!
Aan het einde van de straat vind je de kaaien en de Schelde.
De Grote Markt en de kathedraal van Antwerpen liggen op 350 meter afstand van het appartement.
De Meir (de langste winkelstraat van Antwerpen) ligt op zo'n 250 meter afstand.

name: Vacation home in Antwerpen · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:

Makkelijk toegankelijk naar de stad met de tram naar centrum.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Antwerp South is the hotspot for residents from over whole Antwerp en outer areas to stroll around. Seen and be seen. Enjoy the terraces, the fine diner at the bistro's and restaurants. Away from the tourists. Vibrant and trendy are the superlatives used in magazines when describing this neighbourhood in magazines.

Must visits: Marnixplaats, Leopold de Waalplaats, Scheldekaaien, Vlaamse- en Waalsekaai, St Andries, Wilde Zee, Fashion Quarter, de Meir, Operaplein, Museum of fine Arts, Museum of Temporary Art, museum MAS, the docks and harbour, Stadsfeestzaal, Central Station, Palace of Justice, the Cathedral of Our Lady, Red Light district, etc. Everything is between 20 and 2000 meter from the accommodation.

Small supermarkt at 200m, large supermarkt at 400m. A nightshop with limited assortiment at 30m just around the corner. Terraces and eating at Marnixplaats square at 50m.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the vibrant city of Antwerp, where history, culture, and modernity converge to create a unique and captivating neighborhood experience.

Antwerp, the second-largest city in Belgium, is renowned for its rich history as a major port city, once considered the center of the world's diamond trade. Today, it has evolved into a dynamic and cosmopolitan metropolis with a diverse population, offering something for every visitor.

The city's historic center is a treasure trove of architectural wonders, characterized by stunning medieval buildings and charming cobblestone streets. Explore the iconic Cathedral of Our Lady, a masterpiece of Gothic architecture housing impressive artworks, including paintings by Peter Paul Rubens.

Stroll along the bustling Grote Markt, the heart of the city, surrounded by beautifully adorned guild houses and the imposing City Hall. Indulge in the lively atmosphere of the square, where cafes and restaurants spill onto the pav

host_about: Physiotherapist in Antwerp!

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★4.90 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Onze woning is vlakbij het prachtige Te Boelaerpark gelegen. Ook het Boekenbergpark, het mooie Rivierenhof en Zurenborg met zijn magnifieke Art Nouveau woningen zijn op wandel- of fietsafstand.

Er zijn gezellige cafés en restaurants in de buurt en met de tram, bus of fiets sta je op 10 minuten op de Meir. Zowel de tram als de bus stoppen vlakbij onze woning. Er is ook een Velo station (deelfiets-systeem) op 150 m van de woning. Tevens kent de stad Antwerpen vele andere deelsystemen (SWAP fietsen, deelsteps, Poppy wagens,…) waardoor het erg makkelijk wordt om je doorheen de stad te verplaatsen.

Bakkers, beenhouwers, supermarkten, speeltuin, restaurantjes, wijnbars,… zijn allemaal op wandelafstand.
host_about: Wij zijn Sarah en Lore, en samen met ons 2-jarige dochtertje wonen wij sinds 10 jaar in Antwerpen. In het dagelijks leven zijn wij actief als architect en als sociaal werker. De voorbije jaren hebben wij de wereld rondgereisd (naar Australië, Sri Lanka, Zuid-Afrika, Argentinië, Canada, Thailand,…), waar we steeds hartelijk onthaald werden en bijna uitsluitend gelogeerd hebben in de huizen van andere gezinnen. We vonden dit steeds een zeer fijne ervaring, omdat het voor ons een veel plezierigere en persoonlijkere manier van reizen/verblijven is dan in een onpersoonlijk hotel. Wij hopen deze beleving ook te kunnen doorgeven aan koppels/families die beslissen een bezoek te brengen aan onze mooie bruisende stad Antwerpen. We hopen dat jullie na een dagje citytrippen even hard kunnen genieten van het thuiskomen in onze groene rustige oase als wij! Enjoy!

name: Loft in Antwerpen · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.90 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Right in the energetic heart of the city. Couldn't be more central. Close to the historic center, but also within walking distance of the trendy South and the renovated Scheldt quays. Good food and drinks, fun shopping at the boutiques in the area or at the large chains on the Meir, nice cafes and trendy nightclubs. Everything is nearby.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.64 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Explore Antwerp: A Fusion of Historical Charm and Modern Vibrancy

In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Hoogstraat is located in the heart of the old historic center. It's a shopping pedestrian street (no car traffic), so during the day, there's a lot of liveliness – even on Sundays! – but in the evening and night, it's wonderfully peaceful for sleeping.

The Hoogstraat and the surrounding streets of the old city center are home to numerous restaurants, bars, and every type of shop you can imagine!

Top attractions in the nearby vicinity:

☆ Cathedral of Our Lady (Onze-Lieve-Vrouwekathedraal)
☆ Grand Place (Grote Markt)
☆ City Hall (Stadhuis)
☆ The Stone (Het Steen)
☆ St. Charles Borromeo's Church (Sint-Carolus Borromeuskerk)
☆ Museum aan de Stroom (MAS)
☆ Red Star Line Museum
☆ Plantin-Moretus Museum
☆ Fashion Museum (MoMu)
☆ Museum of Sound (Het Vleeshuis)
☆ DIVA (Museum of Diamonds)
☆ Vlaeykensgang
☆ Saint Anne's Tunnel (Sint-Annatunnel)
☆ Rubenshuis (currently closed)

This is
host_about: Hoi! Ik ben een wildlife biologe die zich heeft omgeschoold tot hypnotherapeut. Ik zorg graag voor anderen. En dat doe ik ook via mijn Airbnb. Ik wil je zo thuis mogelijk laten voelen in mijn appartement. Zelf heb ik al veel gereisd en Airbnb's bezocht. Elke keer dacht ik "Hmm, ik zou het zo (kunnen) doen." En dat deed ik! Ik creëerde mijn ideale Airbnb in het midden van de stad, en ik ben er trots op!

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
You can shop car-free on the Meir, take a walk along the quays, take the ferry to Linkeroever (Sint Anneke Plage, forest walk), explore the island with the Red Star Line museum and MAS (Museum Aan de Stroom) where you can enjoy a very nice view on the top floor (viewing is free). Don't forget to take a look at the beautifully renovated Felix warehouse. You can eat very well in the MAS, but you need to book well in advance. If you cross the Sint Paulusplaats you will come to the Sint Pauluskerk, where you can, for example, view a painting by Rubens. In the Sint Paulusstraat you will find nice coffee houses / wine tastings. In any case, the area offers extensive options for good food; after all you are the touristic center of Antwerp.
You are close to various student facilities such as: art academy, Artesis, Ufsia, Karel de grote Hogeschool.
host_about:
I like to travel and to meet other travelers. 
All over the world I've been treated with respect and I have met people with warm hearths. I cherish those sweet memories.
Nederland, la France, England, Deutschland, Groot Hertogdom Luxemburg, España, Hongarije, Bulgarije, Litouwen, Marokko, Tunesië, Egypte, Mali, Senegal, Zuid-Afrika, Japan, China, Indië, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Mexico, Guatemala, Nicaragua, Panama, Argentinië, Peru, Ecuador, Galàpagos, België.
Welcome to the city of Antwerp.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Condo in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Sfeervolle buurt tussen de Dageraadplaats en het Groen kwartier. Vele fijne café's, restaurants, winkels en supermarkten in de buurt. Centraal gelegen en zeer goed verbonden met het openbaar vervoer, tram en trein vlakbij.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.71 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Antwerpen wordt ook wel dé modestad genoemd en dat kan je in deze buurt volop ontdekken...

Op de Meir vind je voornamelijk de grote ketens. Kijk niet alleen naar de etalages maar bewonder ook de adembenemende architectuur van de winkelpanden uit de 18de en 19de eeuw.

Hou je meer van hip en trendy dan is de Kammenstraat zeker een bezoekje waard. De Nationalestraat en de omliggende straten, waaronder de Lombarden- en Steenhouwersvest, vormen het modieuze hart van Antwerpen.

Voor iedereen die geïnteresseerd is in geschiedenis, monumenten en sfeervolle pleinen en straten... ook het historisch centrum is vlakbij!

Ook andere wijken zoals 't Zuid, 't Eilandje, Zurenborg of Diamand zijn zeker een bezoekje waard.
host_about:
Vorm een gelukkig gezinnetje met mijn man en een kleine kapoen June. 
Ben gepassioneerd door reizen, fotografie en lekker eten. 
En hecht veel belang aan quality time met familie & vrienden.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
De locatie is perfect voor rustzoekers en levensgenieters. Met het stadspark op slechts 1 minuut loopafstand, kunt u genieten van ontspannende wandelingen en momenten van sereniteit. Voor de dagelijkse benodigdheden bevindt de Jumbo-supermarkt zich op slechts 5 minuten loopafstand.

Ontdek de culinaire geneugten van de buurt: ontbijt- en brunchplek 'Barchel' op slechts 3 minuten loopafstand. U kunt ook gemakkelijk de stad verkennen met de tramhalte 'hemel' op slechts een steenworp afstand in de lange leem straat.

Voor degenen die van markten en gezelligheid houden, ligt het theaterplein op slechts 8 minuten loopafstand, waar u kunt genieten van de heerlijke zaterdag- en zondagmarkt en talloze gezellige horecagelegenheden.

Voor de shopliefhebbers onder u is het winkelcentrum van de stad, de Meir, slechts 13 minuten lopen verwijderd.

neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood offers a perfect blend of peace and convenience. The house is situated in a tranquil area, ensuring a peaceful and relaxing stay. You can enjoy the serene surroundings and take leisurely walks in the beautiful park nearby.

For music lovers, the popular concert venues 'De Roma' and 'TRIX' are within easy reach. You can catch some amazing live performances and immerse yourself in the vibrant music scene of Antwerp.

Despite the peaceful setting, you won't feel isolated from the buzz of the city. The historic center of Antwerp is just a short distance away, allowing you to explore the rich history and vibrant culture of the city whenever you desire.

Parking is also hassle-free in our neighborhood. You will find ample affordable parking spaces, making it convenient for those traveling by car.

If you prefer public transportation, you'll be pleased to know that we have excellent metro and tram connections nearby. Hop on a tram or me
host_about:
Hi,

I'm a Dutch guy, living in Antwerp with my 2 sons (Aaren 19, Corbijn 15).
I'm a Visual Artist and owner of graphic design studio NEW BORN UFOS and home decor label BLIKZUM. In my free time I 'm a passionate Fashion and Street Photographer.

I love Contemp. Art, Fashion,  Photography and various styles of Music (Hypnotic Techno, Post-Punk, Jazz). I look forward to sharing my passion for Art, Design & Music with you during your stay with me.

name: Loft in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · ★4.75 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: The house is located at the hear of the historical "Zurenborg" neighborhood, 50m away from the "Dageraadplaats" square . This square is the beating heart of the neighborhood, featuring tons of great cafes, restaurants, the church and more.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.87 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the trendy South. Within walking distance you will find several cozy restaurants and cafes. Public transport is right at the door and there are also shared bicycles nearby.

The trendy south is known for its stately mansions, wide boulevards and beautiful squares. Art lovers will enjoy themselves thanks to the many art galleries and museums such as the FOMU and the M HKA. Shopping enthusiasts also have an ideal base from here. In the Volkstraat you can admire design products, unique accessories, interior pieces and beautiful clothing in the shop windows. Additionally, it's a stone's throw from the center of Antwerp. By public transport you are in 10 minutes in the city center.

Food and drinks
All over Het Zuid you will find nice places to have breakfast, lunch, aperitifs and dinner. For delicious coffee you can go to Kolonel coffee or Butchers Coffee. Admire the sturdy interior of this former butcher's shop. You will find delicious

Wij wonen in een levendige wijk, bewoond door mensen met een afkomst van over de hele wereld. Op een groot plein aan het einde van onze straat, vind je verschillende soorten bars en restaurants: Italiaans, Portugees, Turks, Marokkaans ... Op geregelde tijdstippen wordt het plein gebruikt voor markten, optredens en dergelijke. Aan het andere eind van onze straat ligt een groot park, waarover we u later meer zullen vertellen.

Laten we u meenemen op een tochtje door onze buurt om u een paar hoogtepunten te laten zien die we passeren als we gaan joggen. Allereerst is er Park Spoor Noord, een voormalig spoorwegemplacement waar treinen goederen naar de haven vervoerden en waar ze gerepareerd konden worden, nu omgetoverd tot een park met sportfaciliteiten, speeltuinen, een skatepark, een Scandinavisch restaurant en een zomerbar. Langs een jachtclub en een dok met woonboten komt u bij het Havenhuis, een voormalige brandweerkazerne die is verbouwd door de beroemde architecte Zaha Ha

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★3.92 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

On the other end is Park Spoor Noord, an oasis of greenery where people come together to relax.
Aside from these characteristic areas nearby, the old city centre of Antwerp is still in walking distance from the apartment.

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · 5 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp's South has it all: loads of restaurants (all types of food & price ranges), nice bars on the corner of every street, interesting musems (Fine Arts, Contemporary Arts, Photo museum, galleries), the newly renovated pedestrian Scheldt Quays, several parks with playgrounds for children (New South, Konijnenwei, Vlaamse Kaai), fine architecture (new Justice Palace, KMSKA, Het Bootje, Lambertmontplaats,... ). Off course, Antwerp has much more to offer, but if don't feel like looking too far, than South will surely offer you all that you need.
host_about:
I am a Mexican-Belgian guy living in the wonderful city of Antwerp. Every Mexican lives up to the saying 'mi casa es su casa' (meaning 'my house is your house). I want to export this hospitable attitude to my hometown. 

Looking for a comfortable stay in the centre of Antwerp for couple/family or big group? Want to discover more about what Belgium has got to offer asides Antwerp, such as Bruges, Ghent, Brussels, the Ardennes, wonderful dining, biking culture, chocolate truffles, beer heaven, Jacques Brel, Eddy Merckx, Rene Magritte,... )? 

Then check out my add. I've got a fairly priced big comfortable house with sunny garden to offer in the centre of Antwerp. We can communicate fluently in English, French, Dutch and Spanish. And if you're not too strict, I'll gladly give you my travel tips in German ;)

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.70 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: De woning is gelegen in een rustige, residentiële wijk in het Antwerpse stadsdistrict Deurne. Geen doorgaand verkeer, 30-km beperking in de straat. Op enkele wandelminuutjes bevindt zich het prachtige Rivierenhof. Een enorm stadspark met kastelen, vijvers, kilometers aan wandelpaden, speeltuinen en restaurants. Bij de dichtstbijzijnde ingangen van dit park ook: een kinderboerderij en het Open Lucht Theater met in de zomermaanden elke vrijdag een gratis concert. Ook op wandelafstand (ongeveer 25 minuten) het legendarische Bosuil Stadion van Royal Antwerp FC. Op 200 meter wandelen vindt U de halte van de sneltram 10 waarmee u binnen de 10 minuten in het centrum van Antwerpen bent. Of in de andere richting op enkele haltes bij het grote Wijnegem Shopping Center.

name: Loft in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Right in the heart of the hipster area Zuid (The South), in between Marnix Plaats and Leopold de Leopold de Waelplaats with many trendy restaurants, bars, brunch cafés and art galleries. Zuid is a little gem if you are looking for a well-frequented, quiet, yet animated and well located neighbourhood in Antwerp. The studio is located right in front of the Art Museum and the street residential. Make a left when you are leaving the studio and you will find a few cafés serving breakfasts, brunches and plenty of dining out options : vegetarian, Lebanese, Thai, Chinese, Italian, Japanese, French cuisine and of course, some burger places ! Fancy art, museums or fashion ? Fancy architecture ? Zuid is well-known for stately mansions, wide boulevards and beautiful squares. Art and fashion lovers will appreciate the many art galleries, small independent shops and museums.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

Meanwhile, the culinary and entertainment scenes in Antwerp are equally vibrant. For food enthusiasts, you can enjoy Belgian chocolates and waffles at cozy cafes, or savor modern Fl
host_about:

About myself, I love to travel the world and get to know different cultures and people. 
I am addicted to sports,  hang out with friends and of course being in Antwerp! 
I am a very relaxed, flexible and punctual person... 

So please feel welcome to come along and enjoy Antwerp!

Until we meet,

Sam

Hallo, mijn naam is Maria, ik ben 52 jaar en je bent hartelijk welkom in de gezellige sfeer van de privé kamer in mijn appartement in goede centrale ligging van Merksem aan 7 minuten met de auto van het centrum van Antwerpen! Dichtbij Sport Paleis en aan 15 minuten met de tram of bus naar de Historische centrum van Antwerpen. Stel maar jouw vragen via de app van Airbnb. 
Vriendelijk groeten, 
Maria.

name: Loft in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Right in the heart of the hipster area Zuid (The South), in between Marnix Plaats and Leopold de Leopold de Waelplaats with many trendy restaurants, bars, brunch cafés and art galleries. Zuid is a little gem if you are looking for a well-frequented, quiet, yet animated and well located neighbourhood in Antwerp. The studio is located right in front of the Art Museum and the street residential. Make a left when you are leaving the studio and you will find a few cafés serving breakfasts, brunches and plenty of dining out options : vegetarian, Lebanese, Thai, Chinese, Italian, Japanese, French cuisine and of course, some burger places ! Fancy art, museums or fashion ? Fancy architecture ? Zuid is well-known for stately mansions, wide boulevards and beautiful squares. Art and fashion lovers will appreciate the many art galleries, small independent shops and museums.
host_about: Hi, I am Marcelline. I am a mother of twins and the owner of a Wellness & Beauty Institute called Aux Anges. I love taking good care of my hosts !

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★3.82 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.80 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
This hidden gem is located in Zurenborg - an attractive and affluent part of Antwerp. It also happens to be one of the safest neighborhoods! (Antwerp Police Headquarter just around the corner)

The perfect place to wind down after a long day of exploring Antwerp or working from home or office.

Kick back and relax with a nice cocktail in the courtyard of Den Draak, enjoy home made falafels in the courtyard of Yalla Yalla or devour a 3 course meal at Michelin guided Dome if you're feeling fancy. Options are available for every budget and the choices are endless!

Other must see highlights:

-COGELS-OSYLEI (known as the most beautiful and expensive street in Antwerp) famous for its 19th century art nouveau mansions and stunning architecture. They are listed as heritage monuments and can never be altered.

-KRUGERSTRAAT AKA GRAFFITI STREET famous for its 3000 Square meters of wall painted by 60 international famous graffiti artists du

name: Place to stay in Antwerpen · ★4.59 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

Meanwhile, the culinary and entertainment scenes in Antwerp are equally vibrant. For food enthusiasts, you can enjoy Belgian chocolates and waffles at cozy cafes, or savor modern Fl

Arne

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Dit fijne apartement is gelegen naast het Moorkensplein met een lekkere wijnbar, tof café en het prachtige districtshuis van Borgerhout. Ook ligt het nabij de levendige wijk van de Dageraadplaats met fijne bars, restaurants en geweldige sfeer. Als u van de natuur wilt genieten, kunt u een wandeling maken in de nabijgelegen parken.

Het Centraal station is op loopafstand (10min) of met de tram te bereiken (5min).

Het stadscentrum en de kathedraal van Antwerpen zijn gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de tram (10 min) of met de fiets (15 min).
host_about: I'm a theatermaker from Belgium. When I need to write or when I'm in need for more inspiration I love to visit new cities, stroll around and enjoy the cultural life. For me this is the perfect way to search for a calm cosy place where I can work, in the middle of a vibrant city where I can wander around and gain new experiences.

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
Condo in Antwerpen · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
U bevindt zich in het historische centrum in het gezelligste straatje met op de hoek van de straat het oudste café van Antwerpen. De buurt is gekend voor zijn vele ateliers, antiquairs, expositieruimtes en goudsmids.

Loop letterlijk het hoekje om voor een bruisend terrasje, geprezen cocktailbar of culinaire beleving. Laat u vooral onderdompelen in het culturele centrum. Zin om zelf te koken? Dan staat een volledig uitgeruste keuken tot uw beschikking.

Het Moriaanstraatje is een van de gezelligste straatjes van het historische centrum. Wegens een graffiti kunstwerk en overhangende gevelbeplanting is het een echte foto-hotspot.

Antwerpen is een levendige stad met veel mogelijkheden. Daarom ligt er bij aankomst een magazine klaar met alle toeristische maar ook local hotspots die een bezoek waard zijn.
host_about:
Hi there! I am delighted to introduce myself as your host. It is my mission to guide you successfully through the process of reservation, stay and departure. I hope you may feel welcome, and I wish you a comfortable time in one of our residencies.

As a youngster I was amazed by the historical beauty and opportunities the city of Antwerp has to offer. A couple of years ago I had the chance to relocate to the city centre myself.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.65 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
For your groceries, the Proxy Delhaize is 7 days open between 7:30-20:00 and is only 100m away on the Queen Astrid Square, on left hand side of our Building.

There are also a lot of night shops in the neighbourhood.

The Delhaize Criee supermarket (in Chinatown), which is about a three-minute walk from the building, has a large selection of good-quality meat and fish. And it is only closed on Mondays.

Groeplaats (Green Square) and Cathedral of Our Lady is within 15 minutes of walking or 1.5km
Het Steen Castle is within 23 minutes of walking or 1.8km
MAS museum with a free rooftop (!) is 26 minutes of walking or 2km

---
Antwerp
The old city centre is steeped in history. You will find it in ancient building-fronts on narrow streets or in the imposing Grand-Place. The Plantin-Moretus Museum is the only museum in the world to be classified as a Unesco World Heritage site. In the shadow of the Cathedral of Our Lady, the city te
host_about:
Hi! (-:
I'm Andrew and I'm a World Explorer like you and I love to discover interesting places to stay.

I would love to share one of mine with you ;-)

Don't hesitate to reach me out!

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a lovely and quiet neighborhood near the National Bank and the main city park.

Tram 7 (stops in front of the door) takes you right through the center of Antwerp, via the Mechelseplein and the Meir, to 't Eilandje (Museum aan de Stroom).

You can easily walk to the Mechelseplein (5 min.) for drinks, and to the Theaterplein (7 min.) to browse the Exotic market (Saturday) and the Bird market (Sunday). Also den Botaniek (botanical garden), the Zoo, the Central Station, the shopping streets and 't Zuid are also within walking distance.
host_about:
I'm a researcher, dividing my time between Paris and Antwerp.

I live modestly. I enjoy being outdoors. I love vibrant colors.

name: Tiny home in Antwerpen · ★4.74 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Gelegen midden op het hippe Zuid, op een steenworp afstand van de Schelde, ligt ons kleine paradijsje in Antwerpen. In ‘ons’ steegje is het rustig en stil maar wanneer je de steeg verlaat stap je direct het bruisende stadsleven van Antwerpen in. Zowel het onlangs gerenoveerde Koninklijk Museum van Schone Kunsten als het Museum van Hedenaagse Kunst bevinden zich op 5min wandelen. De Grote Markt, Kathedraal en Groenplaats bereik je na 10min wandelen (tip: wandel door de Kloosterstraat vol met geweldige antiekwinkels en vintage-boetiekjes!).

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
neighborhood_overview:
Gelegen nabij het Sint-Jansplein, één van de grootste pleinen van Antwerpen met wekelijkse markten (op woensdag en vrijdag).

Er is een station van de deelfiets van Antwerpen 'Velo' op het plein.
HIermee kan je gemakkelijk de stad bezoeken.

Park Spoor Noord is een populaire plek voor buurtbewoners en sporters. Basketbal, cricket, pingpong, skaten, petanque, joggen, klimmuur, ... (4 min)

De Coninckplein met gezellige café's, bibliotheek, basketbalplein (8 min)

Centraal station (10 min wandelen, 5 min fietsen)

MAS Museum (15 min wandelen , 6 min fietsen)

Kathedraal (25 min wandelen, 7 min fietsen)

Museum van Schone Kunsten (40 min wandelen , 12 minuten fietsen)

As guests most of the time I am looking for a calm place in nature to hike, run or cycle.

Adventurous, social, trilingual (Flemish, French, English)

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The studio ( on the 3rd floor!) is located in a nice, quiet street. In our multicultural neighborhood, you can enjoy your meals. You will find trendy, cozy (h)honest restaurants and some cozy cafes. Around the corner, you will find delicious takeaway pizza or tajine, the choice is yours. You can walk in 15 minutes to the Zurenborg district with the hip Dawn Place and the beautiful Cogels-Osylei. You can also reach the Chinese and Jewish quarter and the bird market on foot. The department store “Carrefour express” around the corner is open until 8 pm and on Sundays until 1 pm. The cultural temples "De Roma "(15 min) and "De Koningin Elisabethzaal" : (5 min. Lotto Arena , Trix , Sportpaleis 30 min.
The beautiful old town reach by tram or walking. (30 min.) . If you want to shop on the Meir or in Kloosterstraat for a "must have " interior, that is possible on foot for 30 minutes or by tram . (or city bike) Your location is TOP!
host_about:
Hello, my name is Maddy. I live in a nice, renovated townhouse in Antwerp and I furnished the roof apartment as a cozy guest house. (since Dec.2021)  I have already had a lot of fantastic experiences with Airbnb as a guest and I would love to give you a warm welcome as well.
I was an art teacher and now I’m retired. I like walking in the countryside, travelling, and exploring beautiful places (around the world). I enjoy art, architecture, nature and meeting new people.  
Please do not hesitate to contact me in case you would have any questions. (by text message, mail, talk by phone or by popping in downstairs during your stay). I hope to meet you soon and  I will make sure you'll have a wonderful stay in Antwerp.  
Best greetings from Antwerp! 
Maddy

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Fashion District, five minutes away from the city center, is a fashion hub dotted with Belgian designers’ boutiques and cool vintage stores, plus global eateries and lively pubs. Antique shops cluster on Kloosterstraat, where the colorful Stripmuur Nero mural decorates the side of a building. The 16th-century church of St. Andrew has Gothic vaults and baroque altars, while CoStA is a community space offering live music and children’s activities.

The Fashion Museum is the public face of the neighbourhood, and in the Nationalestraat and Kammenstraat area vintage clothing and haute couture go hand in hand. There’s always something going on in this district.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.97 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Het Eilandje has not stolen its name: Antwerp’s oldest port area is surrounded by water. Today, port activity is more concentrated in the north, but the port feeling still prevails here. Taste the old atmosphere of the unloading quay with monumental warehouses, lanterns, hangars and cobblestones. Even if you are familiar with this fast-changing neighbourhood, we recommend that you return regularly because things change so quickly.

Thanks to three crowd-pullers, the MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, the Red Star Line Museum and the Port House, the link between the city and the water is underlined once more.

Het Eilandje is the northernmost neighbourhood of Antwerp. The Port of Antwerp used to be located here, after it slowly moved out of the city centre. So here you will find several docks, some even ordered by Napoleon Bonaparte! And around the docks, you can see the many house-high warehouses, which have now been transformed into fancy lofts.

Het Eilandje i

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.79 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.70 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
This hidden gem is located in Zurenborg - the most attractive and convenient part of Antwerp. It also happens to be one of the safest neighborhoods! (Antwerp Police Headquarters just around the corner)

The perfect place to wind down after a long day of exploring Antwerp or working from home or office.

Kick back and relax with a nice cocktail in the courtyard of Den Draak, or enjoy some home made falafels in the courtyard of Yalla Yalla or devour a 3 course meal at Michelin guided Dome if you're feeling fancy. Options are available for every budget and the choices are endless.

Other must see highlights:

-COGELS-OSYLEI (known as the most beautiful and expensive street in Antwerp) famous for its 19th century art nouveau mansions and stunning architecture. They are listed as heritage monuments and can never be altered.

-KRUGERSTRAAT AKA GRAFFITI STREET famous for its 3000 Square meters of wall painted by 60 international famous gra

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Het appartement is gelegen in de mooie residentiële Tentoonstellingswijk. Van hieruit ben je heel snel in het centrum van Antwerpen maar ook in de buurt zelf kan je heel wat bezoeken.

In het centrum geraak je gemakkelijk via het openbaar vervoer (tram- en bushaltes op 1 min wandelen), via een stadsfiets (station recht voor de deur) of te voet (25 minuten).

Op wandelafstand vind je een kleine supermarkt, een paar ontbijt en lunch mogelijkheden, enkele restaurants en een aantal prachtige parken die zeker het bezoeken waard zijn!
host_about: Love to travel and meet new people. Like sports as swimming, cycling and running. If you want to go to a museum of modern art, I am in  - same for having a good diner or some beers.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.99 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Het appartement ligt tussen het Antwerps historisch centrum en het Eilandje. Naar de grote Markt stap je in 15 minuten, Museum het MAS ligt op 5 minuten wandelen. Een operabezoek, een balletvoorstelling, shoppen op winkelstraat Meir of stappen naar het Antwerps centraal station, je bent nooit langer dan 20 minuten onderweg. Er is een publieke parking op 300m, verschillende stadsfietsstations (Velo) op een paar minuten wandelen en een tramhalte nabij.
Ondanks de rustige ligging van het appartement ben je nooit ver weg van een supermarkt (BioPlanet, AH, Carrefour, Delhaize), bakker (Dellafaille, Diné) of slager (Rosier, Millevaches) en cafeetjes, bistrots of (sterren)restaurants. En verkies je de toeristische eetgelegenheden rond de Grote Markt en de Kathedraal, minder dan een kwartiertje stappen en je hebt keuze te over!

neighborhood_overview: You’ll be right in the middle of Antwerp historic centre. Right next to the appartement is the magnificent “Handelsbeurs”, which used to be the “mother of all trade fairs” in the Antwerp golden age (16th century). You are at 5 minutes walk from the “Grote Markt” (town square) with its impressive Gothic cathedral as well as the Carolus Borromeus church which is situated at probably the cutest square of the entire city. Plenty of cosy restaurants and bars at walking distance as well as the central shopping street (Meir).

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.11 · 2 bedrooms · 8 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths

I work part-time in Paris and my apartment in Antwerp is often available.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.90 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Ons huis is gelegen in een autoluwe straat aan een pleintje, dichtbij winkelstraten (Meir, Wilde zee, ...) en horeca. Veel gezellige cafeetjes achter de hoek en de meer toeristische plekken zoals de Groenplaats en Grote Markt op 10 minuten wandelafstand. Midden in de studentenbuurt kan het hier in de week af en toe iets drukker zijn maar steeds rustig in het weekend.
host_about: Samen met mijn vriend Kevin woon ik in het hartje van Antwerpen centrum, we hebben een tof huis aan een autoluw pleintje met een aparte studio die we airbnb'en. We hebben hard gewerkt om deze studio eigenhandig te renoveren en klaar te maken voor gasten, we hopen dat iedereen hier een fijn verblijf heeft!

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.76 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Loft in Antwerpen · ★4.73 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The Loft is situated in the historical heart of the city, on a walking distance of all city highlights: MAS, Red Star Line Museum, FOMU, Museum of Modern Art, the Cathedral tower, Fashion Museum, the gorgeous Carolus Borromeus church, Meir shopping area but also the local boutiques and trendy fashion stores are nearby.

And ofcourse there are plenty of restaurants, bars and breakfast places in the neighborhood.
host_about: The Collector's House is managed by a creative duo. They're known as notoriously friendly hosts and have a several years experience in running a guesthouse.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.60 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Visit Meir for a fantastic shopping experience while you are in Antwerp. This is one of the most famous shopping streets in Belgium and the busiest. It is also the most important shopping street in Antwerp. You will find many international clothing and shoe labels here, including some of the biggest names on European high streets. Look for smart and casual clothes, jewelry, shoes, items for the home and much more amid the mix of high street stores and local boutiques.

An added bonus of shopping on this traffic-free boulevard are the attractive Rococo buildings that house some of the stores. Many shoppers on the Meir are drawn to the restored Festival Hall. The early 20th-century building is now a shopping center with more than 50 stores.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.84 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Explore Antwerp: A Fusion of Historical Charm and Modern Vibrancy

In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

Meanwhile, the culinary and entertainment scenes in Antwerp are equally vibrant. For food enthusiasts, y
host_about:
Hello, my name is Arne and I’m 26 years old. Love to travel, meet new people and see new places. I enjoy life and try to make the best of it.
If you planned a trip to Antwerp, let me know and I could arrange you a great stay in beautiful apartments. 

Greetings 
Arne

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the city centre of the Antwerp, only 15 minutes walking from the central station.
If you are interested in shopping, all the main shopping streets are on a 5-10 min walk from the apartment. The 'Meir' (biggest, most famous street), 'Nationale straat' and 'wilde zee' (high end) , 'kloosterstraat' (antique). Besides this there is a local big market around the corner every Saturday and Sunday.
Historical buildings, such as the cathedral, town hall and others are on a 15 minutes walk from the apartment.
host_about:
Hi there I'm Tobias. 
I'm born and raised in Antwerp and I hope to be able to welcome you here. 
What I really love about the city is that it has everything you need but its still cosy and small so you can do everything by foot or bike. 
I'm born to a dutch father and brazilian mom and like to learn new languages and learn new cultures. I'm fluent in English, Dutch and Portuguese  and can speak a bit of french, spanish and german. Its nice that I can practice these languages some more while hosting! 
One of my Biggest passions is music and I'm lucky to be able to work with it. 

See you soon!

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · ★New · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: We can assure you that this is just the best neighborhood of Antwerp. Being one of the oldest shopping streets of Antwerp, the Nationalestraat connects the Groenplaats (historic center) with the Royal Museum of Fine Arts (South), which means you can literally explore every important part or highlight of the city by foot! This area contains the most finest boutiques, jewelleries, musea (The Fashion Museum is right in front of the house!), restaurants, bars and art galleries.
host_about:
Hi Hello! Ik ben Liselore, 32 jaar en uw host tijdens uw verblijf in Antwerpen! Met liefde voor interieur, architectuur en hospitality begon ik 4 jaar geleden mijn kleurrijke en gezellige bedrijf SHWAY in Antwerpen. Bij SHWAY voelt het alsof u logeert bij uw beste vriend, maar met de service van een hotel!
Met unieke verblijven op toplocaties in het centrum van Antwerpen, uitgebreide tips en weetjes over de stad en evenementen, soepele automatische check-ins, 24/7 bereikbaarheid en een zeer hoge standaard van de schoonmaak, zorg ik voor een gestroomlijnde en onvergetelijke city/business trip in mijn geweldige stad!

name: Townhouse in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: We can assure you that this is just the best neighborhood of Antwerp. Super central, a quiet street, close to public transfer, in the middle of the best shopping streets and within 10 minutes walking distance from the best restaurants, cafés and museums. The district is called Sint-Andries and it is located in the southern part of the city centre. The district is bordered by the "Historical Center" in the north, the "Theaterbuurt" in the east and "Het Zuid" in the south. Nowadays, it is the fashion centre of the city and a lot of famous Belgian designers are located here. Vintage, design, interior, fashion and boutiques are key words for what to find in this area.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.44 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: A great place for visitors to enjoy a real taste of Antwerp life. Both locals and tourists enjoy the market (Saturday and sunday the market is set on the square in front of our building).
host_about:
Welcome to SLEEP INN Antwerp!

We are here to offer tourists/locals/expats all-inclusive apartments on the best locations in Antwerp to explore or work in the city.

Whether you're in Antwerp alone, as an expat, as a couple for a citytrip or a family our accomodations have all the necessary you would need during your stay for both long and shortterm rentals.

All of our apartments are recently renovated and decorated with passion and style. We are located on a few central toplocations of the beautifull city Antwerpen with some of the best views. We also have a cooperation with the best gyms in Antwerp. When you make a reservation with us, you can train for free and use the wellness facilities, group sessions etc. (ask for more information)

 If you are coming to Theaterplein by car you can hire a parking spot for your car safely at our private garage closeby the apartments.

www Sleepinnantwerp be

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Welkom in het Parijs van Antwerpen. De accomodatie is gelegen op een heel mooi plein in een rustige wijk vol met prachtige art deco herenhuizen.

Dit is een echte woonwijk van de toch wel drukke stad Antwerpen. Het is dus de ideale locatie om enerzijds tot rust te komen en anderzijds het bruisende Antwerpen op 10 min. in te duiken wanneer gewenst.

Zo kan je genieten van een koffietje in het prachtige kader van het Groen Kwartier, een heerlijke lokale spaghetti (ook wel "Bolo Brel" genoemd) in den Brel om de hoek of een resem aan gezellige cafétjes op 10min wandelen in Zurenborg!
host_about:
Hallo! 

Wij zijn twee zussen met een passie voor architectuur, lekker eten en vintage meubels. 
Op een zondag kan je ons terugvinden in een heerlijke brunchbar in Zurenborg en daarna in de winkeltjes van de Kloosterstraat te Antwerpen. 

Aarzel dus niet als je tips wil voor de bruisende stad Antwerpen! 
Wij kijken alvast uit naar jouw/jullie komst. 


Groetjes,
Pauline & Lynn

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Het leuke van de buurt is de centrale ligging, maar dan nèt buiten het echte toeristische deel van de stad. Het is een authentieke buurt met een eigen gezicht en een walhalla voor foodies en mensen die voor een culturele city-trip naar Antwerpen komen.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2.5 baths
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★3.71 · 2 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hi, my name is Ella! I help people rent out their apartments in our beautiful city! :)

In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.77 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
For those who love to shop, the Fashion District Apartments are located in the heart of Antwerp’s fashion district. Here, you’ll find a wide range of designer boutiques, trendy cafes, and gourmet restaurants. And if you’re looking for something a little more cultural, the nearby Museum of Modern Art and the Royal Museum of Fine Arts offer a fascinating glimpse into the city’s rich artistic heritage.

Whether you’re visiting Antwerp for business or pleasure, the Fashion District Apartments offer easy access to some of the city’s most popular attractions. The famous Antwerp Central Station is just a few minutes away, and the historic city center can be reached in just 15 minutes by tram.

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp Dam is a developing neighbourhood. Besides some stunner attractions such as the Sportpaleis and the Lotto Arena, there are many nice cafés and great restaurants. All this in a very folksy setting.

name: Serviced apartment in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Het appartement bevindt zich in het centrum van de stad, middenin de geweldige shopping buurt van Antwerpen. Dicht bij de oude stad (het historische centrum) en op wandelafstand van het trendy Zuid en het mondaine Eilandje (de oude dokken).
Alle musea en bezienswaardigheden zijn vlakbij. Net zoals een overvloed aan restaurants, bars en cafés. 21 Michelinsterren binnen een straal van 1 km.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.72 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2.5 baths
host_about:
Wij zijn Dietrich en Sofie, uitgeweken Kempenaars naar de Koekenstad. 
We wonen in een rustig achterhuis aan het De Coninckplein en genieten van het stadsleven.
We geven je graag tips over te bezoeken restaurants, verborgen historische parels en als barista geeft Dietrich je uitgebreid uitleg over leuke koffiebars en lunchplekjes. 
Wees welkom!

De ruimte

De accomodatie is een rustige, lichte kamer met privé-badkamer. De kamer ligt gescheiden van ons huis, zodat je in alle privacy kan genieten van je verblijf.
Gelegen in een bruisende buurt van de stad, heeft u vanaf hier de perfecte uitvalsbasis om de binnenstad te bereiken.

Openbaar vervoer op 150 meter.
Historisch centrum en Eilandje zijn vlot bereikbaar.

Antwerpen-Centraal (500 meter)
Beer Lovers Bar (100 meter)
Velo (150 meter)
Tram (150 meter)
Viggo’s Specialty Espresso Bar (150 meter)
Meir (1300 meter)
Park Spoor Noord (900 meter)
Cuperus Espresso & Lunchbar, best pie in town! (1000 meter)
MAS - Eilandje (1500 meter)
Historisch centrum (1800 meter)
Zuid (3000 meter)

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
Condo in Antwerpen · ★4.83 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview: Ons appartement ligt in een bruisende buurt van Antwerpen met veel hippe restaurants, cafés, bistro's... Bezoek het  Mas of het Red Star Line-museum. Je kan een mooie wandeling maken naar het  Zaha Hadidplein (waar ons appartement op uitkijkt), langs het Kattendijkdok zijn er gezellige horecazaken.  Boek een boottocht met de Flandria die rechtover de deur voor anker ligt. Fietsen over de mooie fietsbrug aan de Italiëlei en verken zo de stad. Kortom, een leuke plaats om te vertoeven!!!
host_about: Ik hou van reizen met mijn gezin en vrienden, koken, pottenbakken, tennissen en mooie interieurs!

Loft in Antwerpen · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is just in the middle of everything. A few minutes walking from from the University, the MAS and the historical centre, so you can practically walk everywhere. Get the best coffee just in the street at Normo, walk to the MAS for a (free) rooftop view of the city and discover the "Lange Koepoortstraat" as one of the cutest streets or enjoy the street musicians at the Hendrik Conscience square (the most beautiful square of Antwerp).
host_about: I come from a small town close to Antwerp and got attached to the city, however my studies, passion for travel and career took me all over the world. I'm excited to explore new places, as I am excited to show you my favorite places in Antwerp. Hoping to be a great guest and even a better host!

De studio is gelegen aan de Italiëlei, net op de rand van het Eilandje en het bruisende Noord. Je bent op een paar honderd meter van het MAS, waar het winter en zomer heerlijk vertoeven is aan het water.

We now have a beautiful and cosy studio up for rent!
If you would like to know more about Antwerp; we know the best places to eat, drink and go out!

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.42 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the bustling city center of Antwerp at the "Grote Markt", this is the ideal place to visit the lively metropole! Experience the vibrant energy of the city in this centrally located accommodation. While you'll be steps away from all the exciting events and attractions, please note that there may be some increased noise levels at night due to the bustling atmosphere.

The old city centre is steeped in history. You will find it in ancient building-fronts on narrow streets or in the imposing Grand-Place. The Plantin-Moretus Museum is the only museum in the world to be classified as a Unesco World Heritage site. In the shadow of the Cathedral of Our Lady, the city teems with life in intimate pubs and restaurants. The banks of the Scheldt are a great place for a breath of fresh air.

Antwerp is a world city on a human scale. There’s always something to see and experience from interesting museums and fun attractions to surprising spots and architectural highligh
host_about:
You've arrived at the perfect destination. The team profile from HUSWELL!

HUSWELL is a hospitality management company based in Belgium, France & Spain that assists owners of vacation rentals, hotels, b&bs, and so much more. 

We support all owners with the daily operations, the optimization of the accommodation and the guests' experience to ensure everyone has more time for what matters most. Travel & relax!

Feel free to send us a message with any questions you might have. Generally, we reply within 10 minutes, 24/7.

Hospitality regards,
Team HUSWELL

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Pal in het centrum van Antwerpen bevindt zich dit sprookjesachtig appartement. Centraler kan je niet liggen.

Het herenhuis heeft gigantisch veel charme en is met een leuke toets gerenoveerd. Er is veel tijd gestoken in het vinden van 'piece Unique' om er toch "iets anders" van te maken.

Je bent op 30 seconden wandelen op DE befaamde winkelstraat "De Meir" EN de betoverende kerstmarkt!
host_about:
Hallo!

Mijn naam is Charlotte en ik ben trotse verhuurder van een prachtig pand in Antwerpen! De appartementen zijn door mezelf gerenoveerd met passie voor de regels van de kunst.

Verder ben ik een jong geweld van 29jaar dat als projectontwikkelaar door het leven gaat.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.47 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is characterized by its bustling diamond exchanges, diamond workshops, and diamond-related retail stores. Many diamond dealers and professionals from around the world visit this district to trade and purchase diamonds.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.45 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
In the middle of Antwerp, you will find the nice appartement. It could not be more central. It's situated in an old static house, very typical of the Antwerp architecture. You will find a lot of old, unique twists and loads of charm.

Another plus is that the shopping street - best of Belgium so I've heard - is at your doorstep and only 30 seconds away!

Shop until you drop!

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.72 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

name: Condo in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
U bevindt zich in het historische centrum in het gezelligste straatje met op de hoek het oudste café van Antwerpen. De buurt is gekend voor zijn vele ateliers, antiquairs, expositieruimtes en goudsmids.

Loop letterlijk het hoekje om voor een bruisend terrasje, geprezen cocktailbar of culinaire beleving. Laat u vooral onderdompelen in het culturele centrum. Zin om zelf te koken? Dan staat een volledig uitgeruste keuken tot uw beschikking.

Bij warm weer zet u de ramen open en zal u de gezellige sfeer tot in uw woonkamer ervaren. In het weekend hoort u ’s avonds een prachtig samenspel tussen klarinettist en violist komende van het weelderige Conscience plein. Enorm rustgevend.

Antwerpen is een levendige stad met veel mogelijkheden. Daarom ligt er bij aankomst een magazine klaar met alle toeristische maar ook local hotspots die een bezoek waard zijn.
host_about:
Hi there! I am delighted to introduce myself as your host. It is my mission to guide you successfully through the process of reservation, stay and departure. I hope you may feel welcome, and I wish you a comfortable time in one of our residencies.

As a youngster I was amazed by the historical beauty and opportunities the city of Antwerp has to offer. A couple of years ago I had the chance to relocate to the city centre myself.

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
host_about:
Hi, 

I like to travel and see the world. Besides this I'm passionate about bicycles and sustainable transportation. Hope to see you soon in one of the lovely airbnb-places or in my wonderfull hometown Antwerp, in our studio. I love you share my favourite spots with you.

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 2 baths
neighborhood_overview:
Ons huis bevindt zich in de fijne wijk 'oud berchem'.
Onze straat is een prachtige lei met hoge bomen en mooie herenhuizen. Ons deel van de straat is zo goed als autoluwe.
Aan het einde van de straat, 30m van ons huis, waan je je op een frans pleintje. Hier kun je genieten van de terrassen van Cabagine en Cafe Tati.
Op 2 minuutjes stappen vind je een lange winkelstraat met alles wat je maar nodig hebt.
Het hippe 'groen kwartier' bereik je te voet in 10 minuutjes.
Onze wijk grenst aan Zurenborg, met zijn gezellige pleinen dageraadplaats en draakplaats.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★3.81 · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hi, my name is Ella! I help people rent out their apartments in our beautiful city! :)

name: Home in Antwerpen · ★4.71 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The South of Antwerp is the place to be for art, food, fashion and party lovers alike! With fabulous museums like MuHKA (400m), KMSKA (500m) and MAS (2km) within walking distance there is plenty of culture to go around during your stay. Known as a gastronomic hub, the city is bound to charm you one bite at a time. Whether you are looking for Michelin quality food, a sultry cocktail bar or a casual dive, we’ve got it all. Indulge in the many addresses close to the property, to get to know our extensive food scene. Downtown Antwerp is relatively small which makes most landmarks, shops, restaurants and cafes very easily accessible on foot, step or bike. Pro tip: rent yours from any docking station located all over the city!

PS: on the first Sunday of each month, most shops in Antwerp open their doors. However, right around the corner of our apartment you can find Kloosterstraat, the only street in Antwerp which opens every Sunday! Pass by to discover a range of art and antique
host_about:
I travel a lot for work so you will be meeting my assistent most of the time. 

Any questions or recommendations needed tho, i'll be there !

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Our street is located in the heart of the city, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

Antwerp's historical city center is home to a rich cultural and architectural history. The city was once a major center for trade and commerce during the Renaissance and Baroque periods, and this history is reflected in the many stunning historical buildings that still stand today.

One of the most famous landmarks in Antwerp's historical city center is the Cathedral of Our Lady, which was built in the Gothic style in the 13th century.

In addition to its historical buildings, our neighbourhood is also home to a vibrant art, shopping, and dining scene, with a wide variety of stores, galleries, restaurants, and cafes to choose from.

Many galleries and museums showcase the works of local and international artists and there is a diverse range of shops, which include everything from fashion boutiques to antique stores.

The rest

Born and raised in Antwerp I’ll be happy to share all my inside information to experience our city as a real local.

Together with my mother I own a jewellery store and atelier in the city center. Let us know if you want a demonstration of our craft and we’ll be happy to show you !

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.95 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Ons huis ligt vlakbij het grootste park van Antwerpen: het Rivierenhof. Je steekt de straat over en wandelt zo het park in voor een pick-nick of leuke wandeling. In het park vind je een mini-golf, verschillende speeltuinen, kinderboerderij,… Toch ben je op 15 minuten in centrum Antwerpen met tram of fiets. Tramhalte is vlakbij alsook een Velo station (stadsfietsen). Grote supermarkt om de hoek. Restaurants en cafés vlakbij. Het Sportpaleis ligt op 15min wandelafstand.
host_about: Wij zijn Anna en Marco, een Belgisch-Italiaans koppel met een zoontje van 4 Ruben. We werken beide in de zorgsector, maar in onze vrije tijd reizen we graag en zijn we erg bezig met interieur. We hebben van ons huis de warmste thuis proberen te maken en willen die warmte en gezelligheid graag doorgeven aan gasten. We ontmoeten graag nieuwe mensen, van over de hele wereld en zijn blij dat ons huisje ons die mogelijkheid geeft.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.71 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of Flanders, Antwerp is a city where history and modernity intertwine, creating a neighborhood rich in culture and contemporary allure. Wander through cobblestone streets lined with medieval architecture, highlighted by the Gothic Cathedral of Our Lady, showcasing Peter Paul Rubens' masterpieces, as well as going though the lively Grote Markt, that with its ornate guild houses, offers a glimpse into the city's vibrant past.

Antwerp's status as a fashion capital is evident in its trendy Fashion District, where chic boutiques and avant-garde designers reflect the city's stylish spirit. The Royal Academy of Fine Arts further adds to this fashionable ambiance. The city's parks and the Scheldt riverbanks provide tranquil green spaces, offering a peaceful escape from urban life.

Meanwhile, the culinary and entertainment scenes in Antwerp are equally vibrant. For food enthusiasts, you can enjoy Belgian chocolates and waffles at cozy cafes, or savor modern Fl

neighborhood_overview: Het appartement is zeer praktisch gelegen aan de noordkant van het Centrum. Geen gedoe met de stad inrijden of met parkeren (maak gebruik van onze gratis parking). Steek de straat over en je loopt zo de leuke en hippe wijk Het Eilandje in. Het Eilandje is een toffe wijk die veel van het beste van Antwerpen combineert: lekker eten, leuke terrasjes en zomerbars, relaxed leven rondom het water, het beste museum van de stad, het MAS, en de nadrukkelijk aanwezige band met de oude haven van Antwerpen. Wil je ook het oude centrum verkennen? Op 10-15 minuutjes wandelen vanuit het appartement sta je al op de Grote Markt!
host_about: Hoi! Ik ben Lia, een Nederlandse van 37 jaar. Ik woon samen met mijn vriend Marco in Antwerpen en Breda. Ik heb mijn werk in Antwerpen en heb mijn hart verloren aan deze mooie stad! Ons leuke appartementje in het centrum bieden we sinds kort aan op Airbnb! We hebben al veel vrienden en familie hier als gasten verwelkomt, en we zijn blij om nu ook via Airbnb gasten te mogen ontvangen!

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
neighborhood_overview:
The "Eilandje" district is the oldest port area in Antwerp and is surrounded by water. Today the port activity is more concentrated in the north, but the port feeling still dominates here. Taste the old atmosphere of the unloading quay with monumental warehouses, lanterns, hangars and cobblestones.

For good food, you can undoubtedly find something in one of the many and various eateries in the area. The historic city center is a 20-30 minute walk, where there is an even greater range of food and drink, shopping, entertainment and culture.

The MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, the Red Star Line Museum and the Port House are not to be missed in the immediate vicinity, and underline the connection between the city and the water.
host_about:
I live in Antwerp, and I love being a host here! I like to offer guests a homely & comfortable place to stay, along with a smooth & worry-less Airbnb experience.

I like to travel when I get the chance. When traveling I try to use Airbnb as a guest myself as much as possible, as it's a great way to stay in extraordinary places in the snugness of a home.

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hi, my name is Ella! I help people rent out their apartments in our beautiful city! :)

Aloha,

Mijn hart gaat uit naar astrologie, Heilige Geometrie, Hermetisme, kristallen ...
Fijn je te ontmoeten.

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★4.08 · 2 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hi, my name is Ella! I help people rent out their apartments in our beautiful city! :)

name: Rental unit in Antwerpen · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
neighborhood_overview:
Our street is located in the heart of the city, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

Antwerp's historical city center is home to a rich cultural and architectural history. The city was once a major center for trade and commerce during the Renaissance and Baroque periods, and this history is reflected in the many stunning historical buildings that still stand today.

One of the most famous landmarks in Antwerp's historical city center is the Cathedral of Our Lady, which was built in the Gothic style in the 13th century.

In addition to its historical buildings, our neighbourhood is also home to a vibrant art, shopping, and dining scene, with a wide variety of stores, galleries, restaurants, and cafes to choose from.

Many galleries and museums showcase the works of local and international artists and there is a diverse range of shops, which include everything from fashion boutiques to antique stores.

The rest
host_about:
Born and raised in Antwerp I’ll be happy to share all my inside information to experience our city as a real local.

Together with my mother I own a jewellery store and atelier in the city center. Let us know if you want a demonstration of our craft and we’ll be happy to show you !
